pr_title: BREAKING CHANGE: Makes Job Parameters immutable.

timeline.message: Updates to the latest sirius dependencies.

Refactors the Parameter of jobs.

Previously parameters were stateful instances which could not safely be shared or reused.

We now split the builder from the immutable result "Parameter" which can be made public
visible without the danger of a consumer or job which modifies the global instance
accidentally.
Uses the proper superclass for all known parameter builders.
Performs all trivial conversions to the new Parameter API of jobs.
Enforces the usage of Parameters in the Process framework.

Uses the new parameter API for file based Jobs.

This eliminates a ton of parameters and makes the overall API way simpler.
Uses the new parameter API in the JobsRoot.
Provides access to the underlying builder of a parameter and utilizes this in the templates where neccesarry.
